title: The Most Relaxing Classical Album in the World 320cbr 2-CD Set
description:
Source: 1997 2-CD Set

The Most Relaxing Classical Album in the World...Ever! 320cbr (Big Papi) 1997 Virgin 2-CD Set



I hope you enjoy this collection of classical music. I use it to relax and sleep and it does a great job of calming the soul and feeding dreams with good thoughts.

If I had to name this set it just may be the World's Most Spiritual Classical Music Collection. Give it a listen and you'll see why. Such beauty expressed by masters of their trades.

The volume has been slightly normalized to avoid harsh peaks, especially useful when switching between different compilations. Of course, if your other compilations contain harsh peaks then this does little when shuffling the collection.

You will find that uploaders such as Bubanee, Ausy and Eika level out the peaks and pay attention to quality. Ergo, if you have some albums that spike in sound you may want to consider re-stocking your collection with more modern music rips from good encoders.

Ah, once last thing. The 2 CD's tags have been adjusted so that each CD will appear under one album in your music player. Typiically, multi-CD rips show up as multi-CD's and multi-albums. I find grouping the CD's under the one album a much cleaner look.

- Big Papi
